hero.headline: Hello, We're ISG, Your Buyer Agent for Real Estate in Prague.
hero.subheadline: ISG can help with all aspects of the real estate cycle, from buying to selling, financing, renovating, and managing properties.
hero.tagline: Owning a home is the foundation for wealth & peace of mind

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: ISG (Investment Solutions Group) is Prague's premier buyer's agency, specializing in comprehensive real estate services for English speakers. We provide expert guidance through every aspect of the real estate cycle, from acquisition to management, ensuring our clients make informed investment decisions.

stats.expertiseDesc: From buying to selling, financing to renovating

services.title: Our Services
services.description: ISG offers comprehensive real estate services designed to maximize your investment potential and minimize your stress throughout the property cycle.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: Buyer's Agent service, Sales and Rentals, Property Management

mortgages.title: Mortgages and Loans
mortgages.description: Specializing in Mortgages for Foreigners since 2008

construction.title: Construction Management
construction.description: Architecture and Design, Renovation Projects, Full construction management service

investment.title: Property Investment
investment.description: Property investment services, Assistance with acquiring properties and mortgages

team.title: Our Expertise
team.description: ISG brings together a team of experienced professionals specializing in all aspects of real estate investment and management in Prague. Our comprehensive approach ensures you receive expert guidance at every step of your property journey.
team.realEstateDesc: Expert buyer's agents, sales professionals, and property managers with deep knowledge of Prague's real estate market.
team.mortgageDesc: Certified Czech mortgage brokers helping you secure the best financing options for your property investments.
team.constructionDesc: Experienced architects, designers, and project managers overseeing renovation and construction projects from start to finish.
team.investmentDesc: Financial specialists providing strategic guidance on property investment opportunities and portfolio management.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Our clients value our personal approach, attention to detail, and dedication. Here's what some of them have to say:
testimonials.example: Professional service, excellent support, and the perfect property for our family!

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to start your real estate journey? Contact ISG today for expert guidance on buying, selling, financing, or managing properties in Prague.

footer.companyBlurb: ISG can help with all aspects of the real estate cycle, from buying to selling, financing, renovating, and managing properties.

property1.title: Prodej bytu 2+kk 44 m², Jana Želivského, Praha
property1.subtitle: Newly offered for sale is a beautiful and practical 2+kk apartment with a total size of 44 m², located on the 1st floor in one of Prague's most sought-after locations – Jana Želivského.

property2.title: Prodej bytu 1+kk 34 m², Jana Želivského, Praha
property2.subtitle: Sale of a 1+kk apartment, 30 m², on the 2nd floor of a building with an elevator, in Prague 3 – Žižkov.

property3.title: Prodej bytu 1+kk 30 m², Jana Želivského, Praha
property3.subtitle: This part of the city is undergoing a major transformation and is becoming one of the most sought-after and trendy neighborhoods in Prague, similar to neighboring Karlín. Prices of new apartments in Žižkov are now rising the most in the entire metropolis.

property4.title: Prodej bytu 2+1 49 m², Seifertova, Praha - Žižkov
property4.subtitle: 2+1 apartment 49 m² for sale Seifertova, Prague - Žižkov; basement, elevator, multi-story, personal ownership, in very good condition.

property5.title: Prodej rodinného domu 168 m², pozemek 281 m², Na Jarově, Praha - Žižkov
property5.subtitle: GLJ Partners offers for sale a family house in the quiet residential part of Prague 3 Žižkov, on Na Jarově street. The property is an ideal choice for two-generation living or investment. A construction project to expand the living area of the house is currently underway.
